name: Associazione Centro Studi Finanza & Persona OAdvisory
goal: Our focus is on helping microfinance and ethical businesses manage and control their risks. That way, management can focus on the core priorities that will move the business forward.
interests: Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: active member of the European Microfinance Network developing social economy and microfinance initiatives at local level. Studying a common approach with EU organizations such as ADIE. Currently scouting social initiatives with Balcanic country Montenegro to develop Italy - Montenegro social economy activities.
